questions.question: Which of the following is a singular noun?
questions.explanation: The singular noun is 'crisis'. 'Media', 'phenomena', and 'oases' are all plural nouns. 'Media' is the plural of 'medium', 'phenomena' is the plural of 'phenomenon', and 'oases' is the plural of 'oasis'.
